attributes.action: To be softer on hair colour and makeup etc rules in schools
attributes.background:
I believe as a student in a secondary school that for example having lets say blue coloured hair doesn't affect your education at all or having looped earrings etc.
i think that schools are being way too strict on piercing rules and hair colour etc..

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise isn't the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

The Government publish guidelines for schools on school uniform policy, but specific decisions about that policy and non-compliance are a matter for the schools themselves. You can find out more about the Government's guidance here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/school-uniform
